description.title: Hello, Resonators.
reasons: Here's what we think the future of music sharing looks like.
description.subtitle: Features

topics.title: Personalize
facts: • Create a personalized profile that reflects your taste in music.

topics.title: Connect
facts: • Follow others and discover music with them.

topics.title: Song of The Week
facts: • Post your 'song of the week', the song you're vibing with the most and want to represent your profile for the week.

topics.title: Gamification
facts: • Rank up on the gamified platform by showing others your know your music.
